title: Ep. 217: Can MAC’s Drew Elliott Break the Internet Again?
itunes:title: Ep. 217: Can MAC’s Drew Elliott Break the Internet Again?
itunes:subtitle: Creative director Drew Elliot, formerly of Paper and America’s Next Top Model, is the new global creative director of MAC Cosmetics, and he’s here to discuss how pop culture influences makeup (and vice versa), how the beauty ...
description:
Creative director Drew Elliot, formerly of Paper and America’s Next Top Model, is the new global creative director of MAC Cosmetics, and he’s here to discuss how pop culture influences makeup (and vice versa), how the beauty brand is working to become more diverse and inclusive, new collaborations, his favorite MAC classics, and what goes into his creative process (Peanut M&M's are involved). We hope you enjoy our first Thursday episode! -- Want more Fat Mascara? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
